reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Brazil: Supporting a new Open Innovation policy in Health for the State of Sao Paulo and improving the business environment for new health technologies

description.narrative: This project will help deliver a more efficient public health system in São Paulo state through an open innovation approach, fostering entrepreneurship and developing public-private partnerships.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
